item.title: Talks
item.description: 2019 DevOpsDays PDX - Best Vends: The How + Why to Befriend Your Vendor 2018 DevOpsDays ZH - Microservices Means Macrocommunication Girls Have IT Day - Keynote 2017 DevOpsDaysPDX - Disposable Infrastructure: You Only Build Me Up To Tear Me Down

item.title: About
item.description: about hiiiii. i’m paige. i’ve been in tech for about 5 years starting out in People Operations -> Product Engineering -> Site Reliability Engineering i have a degree in Engineering Management (yes this is a thing) and went to a bootcamp (yes you should hire bootcamp grads) i’m starting this site as a place to document learnings, post notes from good books, takeaways from conference talks, and recommendations topics of interest:

item.title: hello world
item.description: hello world welcome to my blog! it is the Terminal theme, Hugo, hosted by GitHub Pages. when the .dev domains were released i had a fun afternoon checking to see if various and hilarious to me domains were available. paigerduty was and here we are.
